segments.text: I notice the woman at the sink, completely focused on drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems oblivious to the water overflowing and the kids' antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching for cookies in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, eagerly waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous just watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they would all just take a moment to appreciate the peaceful surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt in this messy situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should pay more attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I know it's not my place to interfere.
segments.speaker: PAR
